title: Hextech Crafting keeps crashing my client everytime I try to click on it
body:
I just bought some augment chests and I tried to access Hextech Crafting, and it's the 4th time I try to enter and it keeps crashing, is there some kind of fix or I just can't open my chests? :/

**Edit:** It seems like Plays.tv, Overwolf and other third party apps are making Hextech Crafting crash, just in case some of you have this problem, just close the app ;)

replies.body: That's a very interesting find!  I'm not sure if it's just a coincidence since there have been other issues, mostly from the recent Windows update.  Third party apps can definitely cause some problems with the game and client, especially after a new patch.  I will keep this in mind and look for results.  Thanks!
I've had the same problem too so it's not just him! Thanks for looking into it (if you didn't forget to ;p)

This worked for me but some info to try to find solution to why since before finding this post I tried to repair and even reinstalled to no avail. My situation was on my main account loot and crafting would crash every time after I earned a 3rd key fragment starting 8/10. When I log into my smurf it never crashed at all even tho I still had plays.tv open.  Play.tv usually opens once I play a game and today I haven't yet and Icon wasn't open but when open task manager it was running in background. Hope this helps any one trying to get that sweet sweet free stuff!! :)
I found this happening to me as well. I most certainly did have Plays.tv open. I don't really use the app but it boots up after a restart. I closed the app and it worked.
It didnt solve my problem it still crashes when i try to enter...........

Hey guys,
just to let you know I turned plays.tv off and now everything works fine seems i'll have to use plays.tv when i don't need my loot :D
Yup with plays.tv closed it works fine. Still wonder why it only occurs on my main.

I contacted support and thanks to _**hyperionesque**_  i managed to find out it was all because of Plays.tv. As soon as i closed the program everything worked the way it's supposed to. PS: any other 3rd party program might also cause an issue so be careful ;) .

Thank you Riot for the fast reply, helped me out a lot :D
